title: 2013 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 57)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2013 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Please consider helping PaleoPirate out...

----

PaleoPirate wrote:  Hey TT, my friend, I was wondering if you could help me with a slight problem I'm having. Every year, I make a series of Christmas music videos for my church, and I'm trying to round out the line up. I'm kind of thinking that your knowledge of Christian music surpasses my own (which is no small feat, if I do say so myself), so I'm coming to you (or anyone else reading this) for assistance. I need a song. I'm replacing Glory to God by Todd Agnew. It's a very energetic song performed by a gospel choir, and it's supposed to be the angels singing to the shepherds. I need something along the same lines. Can anyone out there help me? It would be very appreciated.

If anyone is interested in seeing any of my lyric videos, do a user search for PaleoPirate on YouTube. I've got 20 or so videos uploaded so far, with more on the way. 

----

...As I am unable to think of any songs for PaleoPirate right off the top of my head, I was hoping that maybe some of you might.  So thanks in advance guys.

INSTRUMENTAL: 12 Stones.  CHRISTMAS: ACCalive, The Civil Wars, Dave Herring Band, Falling Up, Fishermen, Flyleaf, John Mark McMillan, Lacy Deese, Phil Laeger, Tiki McPherson, Trevor Davis.  ALTERNATIVE: Atlas Woods, The Remembrance, Sleeping At Last.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Breav, Forever Life Boys, G.O.M, John The Baptist, Magoh, Revelayce, Ryckman Brothers, Teddie Lee.  PUNK: City Lights.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Daniel Bashta, LifePoint Music.  GOSPEL: The Disciples.  CLASSICAL: Dominican Sisters Of Mary Mother Of The Eucharist.  ROCK: Elevation, My Epic.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Hanan Barth.  JAZZ: Harry Awortwi.  BLUES: The Holmes Brothers.  CONTEMPORARY: Josh Garrels, Sandi Patty.

We are now up to 1,669 shares for 2013.  That surpases our 2012 total by 208 releases, and blows away our 2011 total by 705 releases.

Bundle 57 includes the following 37 releases...

For Him,
TorrentTracts - December 2013
